select a.id,price,quantity,a.uid,a.create_time,a.state from user_trade a
1 = 1
and a.state = '1'
order by price asc

select realname,nickname,id,price,quantity,uid,create_time,state,isMySelf from (SELECT b.realname,b.nickname,ut.id,ut.price,ut.quantity,ut.uid,ut.create_time,ut.state,"1" AS isMySelf FROM user_trade ut LEFT JOIN user_info b ON ut.uid = b.uid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ut.state <> '3' and ut.state <>'4' AND ut.uid = #{uid} UNION SELECT ui.realname,ui.nickname,ut.id,ut.price,ut.quantity,ut.uid,ut.create_time,uth.state,"0" AS isMySelf from user_trade_history uth left join user_trade ut on uth.user_trade_id = ut.id left join user_info ui on ut.uid = ui.uid where uth.state = '6' and uth.purchase_uid = #{uid} UNION SELECT b.realname,b.nickname,a.id,a.price,a.quantity,a.uid,a.create_time,a.state,"0" AS isMySelf FROM user_trade a LEFT JOIN user_info b ON a.uid = b.uid WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.uid <> #{uid} AND a.state in( '1','5')) t where 1 ORDER BY state desc,isMyself desc,price asc limit #{pageNum},#{pageTotal}

select count(*) from ( SELECT b.realname, b.nickname, a.id, a.price, a.quantity, a.uid, a.create_time, a.state FROM user_trade a LEFT JOIN user_info b ON a.uid = b.uid WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.state <> '3' and a.state <>'4' AND a.uid <> #{uid} ) t where 1 ORDER BY price asc
update user_trade set state = ${state} where id = ${id}

select a.id,a.purchase_uid,a.sell_uid,a.user_trade_id,
a.sell_quantity as quantity,
a.purchase_quantity as quantity,
a.price,a.create_time, c.price,
(select d.nickname from user_info d where a.sell_uid = d.uid) as realname
(select d.nickname from user_info d where a.purchase_uid = d.uid) as realname
from user_trade_history a left join user_account b on a.purchase_uid = b.uid left join user_trade c on a.user_trade_id = c.id
1 = 1
and a.purchase_uid = #{uid} and c.state = #{state}
and a.sell_uid = #{uid}
and a.state <> '6'
order by create_time desc
SELECT ul.user_trade_id AS userTradeId, ul.lock_uid AS lockUid, ul.lock_time AS lockTime FROM user_trade_lock ul LEFT JOIN user_trade ut ON (ul.user_trade_id = ut.id) WHERE ut.state = '5'
select id,uid,state from user_trade where id=#{id}
SELECT uh.sell_quantity, uh.price, ui.nickname, ui.mobile FROM user_trade_history uh LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (uh.purchase_uid = ui.uid) WHERE uh.user_trade_id =#{id}
select id,uid,state from user_trade where state=#{state}
